channel.title: Insidiax v2 Source| How to make your name colored in public chat?
channel.description:
Hi guys, I was wondering if there was a tutorial on how to make your name colored in public chat in the chat box, when you speak. My friend did it on his server, and I forgot to ask him. if someone could tell me how or send me a link to a tut that would be great. And yes I have already looked for one.
Thanks, Jordan6203
